Class Encounter

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Encounter
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int gamesDrew
      Represents the amount of games drew.
      private int gamesLost
      Represents the amount of games lost.
      private int gamesWon
      Represents the amount of games won.
      private java.lang.String name
      Represents the name of the Entity that these encounters are based on.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the amount of times the user has drew against this Entity

      Gets the amount of times the user has lost against this Entity

      Gets the total amount of times that the user has played against this Entity

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        Represents the name of the Entity that these encounters are based on. Can be used as a unique identifier for the type of Entity.

      • gamesWon

        private int gamesWon
        Represents the amount of games won.

      • gamesLost

        private int gamesLost
        Represents the amount of games lost.

      • gamesDrew

        private int gamesDrew
        Represents the amount of games drew.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Encounter

        public Encounter(java.lang.String name,
         int gamesWon,
         int gamesDrew,
         int gamesLost)
        This constructor takes all the values of the Encounter and stores them
        Parameters:
        name - indicates the name of the Entity
        gamesWon - indicates the amount of times this Entity has lost, showing how many times the user has won against them
        gamesDrew - indicates the amount of times this Entity has drew, showing how many times the user has drew against them
        gamesLost - indicates the amount of times this Entity has won, showing how many times the user has lost against them
